We design program test intervention strategy improve weight loss outcome WISEWOMAN population . Specifically , purpose North Carolina WISEWOMAN Weight Control Pilot Study , `` Weight-Wise '' Program , test effectiveness weight loss weight loss maintenance intervention among WISEWOMAN participant , conduct community health center Wilmington , NC . The Weight-Wise Program launch February 2005 continue Spring 2007 . The study design intervention briefly describe . Each WISEWOMAN participant invite screen visit health center . During interview research assistant , participant answer series question health history , diet , physical activity , weight management behavior , psycho-social attribute . She also height , weight , blood pressure , body composition measure . A non-fasting venous blood specimen take measure blood lipid ( total HDL-cholesterol ) random blood glucose . Additional baseline measure psycho-social variable obtain via telephone administration . Participants complete screen visit , phone interview , meet eligibility requirement randomize two treatment group : Special Intervention ( SI ) group , Delayed Intervention ( DI ) group . Participants assign SI group begin 4-month weight loss phase study April 2005 , DI participants wait end first program offering begin weight loss program . [ DI participant consider 'control ' group . ] The intervention program , call `` Weight-Wise '' , consist four-month weight loss intervention phase , one-year maintenance phase . During weight loss intervention , participant offer 16 weekly group education session teach health counselor . The study goal weight loss period 10 pound . Each session last 120 minute include following element : participant weigh-in , group share problem-solving , discussion weight control topic ( nutrition , physical activity , behavior change ) , moderate physical activity and/or taste-testing . Study participant complete weight loss program lose 8 pound eligible continue maintenance phase intervention . During 1-year maintenance phase ( start end weight loss phase SI DI ) , participant SI group receive 1 individual face-to-face contact health counselor , 8 monthly phone contact , 3 group session . The DI group receive 1 individual face-to-face contact 11 phone contact health counselor maintenance intervention . After weight loss phase 6 12 month maintenance intervention , SI DI participant return clinic follow-up data collection .
